Original: 戶外酒吧好舒服，還有好吃的牛肉麵、牛舌
EN: The outdoor bar is so comfortable, as well as delicious beef noodles and beef tongue

Original: 氣氛很讚，天氣很冷老闆還貼心提供毯子👍👍👍
EN: The atmosphere is great, the weather is very cold, the boss also provides a blanket intimately 👍👍👍

Original: View很讚，頂樓氣氛佳，價格偏高～
EN: View is very good, the top floor atmosphere is good, the price is high ~

Original: 跟朋友聊到一點多，剛好老闆在，有小聊幾句🌟 很放鬆的環境，吧台有暖爐，天氣冷的時候就算在戶外也可以取暖！很有氣氛🌟❣️會想要再訪
EN: I talked with friends a little bit, just happened to be the boss, there was a little chattering environment, there was a heating burner in the bar, and even when the weather was cold, you could warm it outdoors!Very atmosphere 🌟❣️ I want to visit again

Original: 難得內湖有好酒吧！重點老闆人超nice 生日壽星shot 喝不完🤣
EN: There are good bars in Neihu!Key boss super Nice birthday Shi Shot

Original: 內湖（靠近大直）酒吧新地標，酒好喝，酒食也很棒！
EN: Neihu (close to Da Zhi) new landmarks, wine is good, wine and food are great!

Original: 調酒超讚👍 bartender 超好聊～～～
EN: Blooming is superb 👍 Bartender is super chat ~~~

Original: 吃了牛排，肉質鮮嫩，服務很快，份量很足，謝謝工作人員的笑臉。
EN: After eating steaks, the meat is tender, the service is fast, and the portion is enough. Thank you for your smile.
